useCase.name: Integration of Buildkite with CI Integration tool

preconditions.precondition: Bob pushes a commit to the master branch of the Repository

useCase.trigger: Webhook triggers pipeline in the Awesome pipeline

mainSequence.step: Repository receives the commit push from Bob
Sync pipeline is triggered by the Awesome pipeline
CI Integration tool runs the sync command
CI Integration tool adds new build data to Firestore
Sync pipeline finishes the sync command
Bob receives the finished build data export
